message: Accept this generous offer and we can call it a day!
A compromise, I'm willing to give you a third, but I want most of the cash!
You can't have it all, Alice! 3/4 for me, 1/4 for you.
I'm willing to give you a decent chunk, but I still want more than half!
You're getting desperate, Alice. I'm taking 80% of the cash.
I'm not going down without a fight! Take the scraps and be grateful!
You're going to regret not taking my previous offers...
You're not taking advantage of me, Bob! I'm taking most of the cash and leaving you with scraps!
You're really pushing your luck, Alice. I'm taking 99.9% of the cash.
You're not getting away with this, Bob! I'm taking almost all the cash and leaving you with a single dollar!
